scripts.build:start:all: concurrently "cd mailer-service && npm run docker:start" "cd node-mongodb && npm run docker:start
scripts.docker:u:all: concurrently "cd mailer-service && npm run docker:u" "cd node-mongodb && npm run docker:u
scripts.docker:d:all: concurrently "cd mailer-service && npm run docker:d" "cd node-mongodb && npm run docker:d
scripts.build:all: concurrently "cd mailer-service && npm run build" "cd node-mongodb && npm run build
scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd mailer-service && npm run start" "cd node-mongodb && npm run start
scripts.watch:all: concurrently "cd mailer-service && npm run watch" "cd node-mongodb && npm run watch
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "cd mailer-service && npm run dev" "cd node-mongodb && npm run dev
